column5: Bearded Cap is the best Cap!
I have never had a bad reaction to smoking and I seriously CANNOT during this whole ordeal. My anxiety is making me freak the fuck out if I get stoned.
I’m on my second playthrough and I just finished Hearts of Stone again. Such a great story!
It took me until my second playthrough to figure that out... 🤦🏼‍♀️
Favorite is rock troll. Whenever they actually talk, they’re funny as hell. Most hated is definitely those stupid ass centipedes, annoying nuisances.
